task: Develop a basic 'Sonic the Hedgehog' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Get your neck massaged'.
name: Sonic's Relaxing Rush

branding_data.short_description: Join Sonic in a soothing adventure where speed meets relaxation.
branding_data.detailed_description: Sonic's Relaxing Rush combines the fast-paced platforming action of classic Sonic games with a unique twist: relaxation. In this game, players will guide Sonic through serene environments where the goal is not just to reach the end quickly, but to enjoy the journey. The game features gentle soundscapes, calming visuals, and moments where Sonic can stop to relax and rejuvenate, such as getting his neck massaged by friendly creatures. This innovative approach encourages players to balance speed with tranquility, offering a refreshing take on the Sonic franchise.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
